wikipedia_page.main: Flora Mary McDonnell, as the daughter of an Earl also known as Lady Flora McDonnell (born 7 November 1963) is an artist, illustrator, and prize-winning author of children's books.

response: McDonnell is an uncle of the artist Lady Flora McDonnell.Susan Morris, ed. Debrett's Peerage and Baronetage 2019 (2019), p. 1554
